paper_abstract: In this paper we show that a connected graph of order n, radius r and minimum degree delta has at least 1/2 (delta n + (n-1)(delta-2)/(delta-1)(r)-1) edges, for n large enough, and this bound is sharp. We also present a similar result for digraphs. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Minimum size of a graph or digraph of given radius
